issue.title: [Java]List vector child value count not set correctly
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4539](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4539). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We are not correctly processing list vectors that could have null values. The child value count would be off there by losing data in variable width vectors.
